mapper.sql: wss.`id`, wss.`root_enterprise_id`, wss.`subject_id`, wss.`code`, wss.`name`, wss.`direction`, wss.`src_account_subject_id`, wss.`src_auxiliary_name`, wss.`src_auxiliary_source`, wss.`dest_account_subject_id`, wss.`dest_auxiliary_name`, wss.`dest_auxiliary_source`, wss.`period_year`, wss.`period_num`, wss.`period_year_num`, wss.`is_approved`, wss.`is_released`, wss.`is_enable`, wss.`is_del`, wss.`create_time`, wss.`creator_id`, wss.`creator_name`, wss.`update_time`, wss.`updator_id`, wss.`updator_name`, wss.`manage_info`, wss.`version`
mapper.select:
select ws.subject_name, ws.account_book_type_name, was_src.code src_account_subject_code, was_src.full_name src_account_subject_name, was_dest.code dest_account_subject_code, was_dest.full_name dest_account_subject_name,
from wd_subject_synergy wss left join wd_subject ws on ws.id = wss.subject_id left join wd_account_subject was_src on was_src.id = wss.src_account_subject_id left join wd_account_subject was_dest on was_dest.id = wss.dest_account_subject_id where wss.id = #{id}

select ws.name as subjectName, ws.account_book_type_name, was_src.code src_account_subject_code, was_src.full_name src_account_subject_name, was_dest.code dest_account_subject_code, was_dest.full_name dest_account_subject_name,
from wd_subject_synergy wss left join wd_subject ws on ws.id = wss.subject_id left join wd_account_subject was_src on was_src.id = wss.src_account_subject_id left join wd_account_subject was_dest on was_dest.id = wss.dest_account_subject_id
1 = 1 and wss.is_del = 0
and wss.subject_id in
#{subjectId}

select ws.subject_name, ws.account_book_type_name, was_src.code src_account_subject_code, was_src.full_name src_account_subject_name, was_dest.code dest_account_subject_code, was_dest.full_name dest_account_subject_name,
from wd_subject_synergy wss left join wd_subject ws on ws.id = wss.subject_id left join wd_account_subject was_src on was_src.id = wss.src_account_subject_id left join wd_account_subject was_dest on was_dest.id = wss.dest_account_subject_id
1 = 1 and wss.is_del = 0 and wss.id in
#{subjectSynergy.id}

update.foreach:
update wd_subject_synergy wdss
wdss.is_del = 1,
wdss.is_approved = 1,
wdss.is_approved = 0,
wdss.is_released = 1,
wdss.version = wdss.version +1,
where wdss.id = #{subjectSynergy.id} and wdss.version = #{subjectSynergy.version};
